00011 // random.cpp*
00012 #include "sampling.h"
00013 #include "paramset.h"
00014 #include "film.h"
00015 class RandomSampler : public Sampler {
00016 public:
00017         RandomSampler(int xstart, int xend, int ystart,
00018                 int yend, int xs, int ys);
00019         ~RandomSampler() {
00020                 FreeAligned(imageSamples);
00021         }
00022         bool GetNextSample(Sample *sample);
00023         int RoundSize(int sz) const { return sz; }
00024 private:
00025         // RandomSampler Private Data
00026         bool jitterSamples;
00027         int xPos, yPos, xPixelSamples, yPixelSamples;
00028         float *imageSamples, *lensSamples, *timeSamples;
00029         int samplePos;
00030 };
00031 
00032 RandomSampler::RandomSampler(int xstart, int xend,
00033                 int ystart, int yend, int xs, int ys)
00034         : Sampler(xstart, xend, ystart, yend, xs * ys) {
00035         xPos = xPixelStart;
00036         yPos = yPixelStart;
00037         xPixelSamples = xs;
00038         yPixelSamples = ys;
00039         // Get storage for a pixel's worth of stratified samples
00040         imageSamples = (float *)AllocAligned(5 * xPixelSamples *
00041                 yPixelSamples * sizeof(float));
00042         lensSamples = imageSamples +
00043                       2 * xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples;
00044         timeSamples = lensSamples +
00045                       2 * xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples;
00046 
00047         for (int i = 0;
00048              i < 5 * xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples;
00049                  ++i) {
00050                 imageSamples[i] = RandomFloat();
00051         }
00052 
00053         // Shift image samples to pixel coordinates
00054         for (int o = 0;
00055              o < 2 * xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples;
00056                  o += 2) {
00057                 imageSamples[o]   += xPos;
00058                 imageSamples[o+1] += yPos;
00059         }
00060         samplePos = 0;
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool RandomSampler::GetNextSample(Sample *sample) {
00064         // Compute new set of samples if needed for next pixel
00065         if (samplePos == xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples) {
00066                 // Advance to next pixel for stratified sampling
00067                 if (++xPos == xPixelEnd) {
00068                         xPos = xPixelStart;
00069                         ++yPos;
00070                 }
00071                 if (yPos == yPixelEnd)
00072                         return false;
00073 
00074                 for (int i = 0;
00075                      i < 5 * xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples;
00076                          ++i) {
00077                         imageSamples[i] = RandomFloat();
00078                 }
00079 
00080                 // Shift image samples to pixel coordinates
00081                 for (int o = 0;
00082                      o < 2 * xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples;
00083                          o += 2) {
00084                         imageSamples[o]   += xPos;
00085                         imageSamples[o+1] += yPos;
00086                 }
00087                 samplePos = 0;
00088         }
00089         // Return next \mono{RandomSampler} sample point
00090         sample->imageX = imageSamples[2*samplePos];
00091         sample->imageY = imageSamples[2*samplePos+1];
00092         sample->lensU = lensSamples[2*samplePos];
00093         sample->lensV = lensSamples[2*samplePos+1];
00094         sample->time = timeSamples[samplePos];
00095         // Generate stratified samples for integrators
00096         for (u_int i = 0; i < sample->n1D.size(); ++i)
00097                 for (u_int j = 0; j < sample->n1D[i]; ++j)
00098                         sample->oneD[i][j] = RandomFloat();
00099         for (u_int i = 0; i < sample->n2D.size(); ++i)
00100                 for (u_int j = 0; j < 2*sample->n2D[i]; ++j)
00101                         sample->twoD[i][j] = RandomFloat();
00102         ++samplePos;
00103         return true;
00104 }
00105 
00106 extern "C" DLLEXPORT
00107 Sampler *CreateSampler(const ParamSet &params,
00108                        const Film *film) {
00109         int xsamp = params.FindOneInt("xsamples", 2);
00110         int ysamp = params.FindOneInt("ysamples", 2);
00111         int xstart, xend, ystart, yend;
00112         film->GetSampleExtent(&xstart, &xend, &ystart, &yend);
00113         return new RandomSampler(xstart, xend,
00114                                  ystart, yend,
00115                                                          xsamp, ysamp);
00116 }
